name: nextjs-dotnet
description: A spec2cloud shell template for building full-stack applications with: - **Frontend**: Next.js (TypeScript, App Router) - **Backend**: .NET 10 (Minimal API) - **Deployment**: Azure Container Apps via AZD - **Testing**: Playwright (e2e) + Cucumber.js (Gherkin) + xUnit (.NET)

scripts.test:all: npm run test:cucumber && npm run test:e2e
